document.publication: The Poems of Emily Dickinson, Variorum Edition, Franklin, 1998
document.full_text: <xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan"> </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#ecff56">Recollect </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">the </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#607cff">Face </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">of </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">me </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">When </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">in </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">thy </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#94d4f0">Felicity, </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#607cff">Due </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">in </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#607cff">Paradise </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#607cff">today </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#607cff">Guest </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">of </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">mine </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#a8e0ff">assuredly </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Other </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#607cff">Courtesies </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">have </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">been </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">Other </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#607cff">Courtesy </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">may </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">be </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">We </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#607cff">commend </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">ourselves </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">to </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">thee </xhtml:span></xhtml:p><xhtml:p class="text_p"><xhtml:span class="text_edgespan">    </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#98ff24">Paragon </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">of </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_coloredword" style="color:#a8e0ff">Chivalry </xhtml:span><xhtml:span class="text_word">- </xhtml:span></xhtml:p>
document.title: Recollect the face of me
